verses.name: 1 Samuel 4:20
verses.text: And about the time of her death the women that stood by her said unto her, Fear not; for thou hast born a son. But she answered not, neither did she regard it.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 4:21
verses.text: And she named the child I–chabod, saying, The glory is departed from Israel: because the ark of God was taken, and because of her father in law and her husband.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 4:22
verses.text: And she said, The glory is departed from Israel: for the ark of God is taken.
